author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Trinity Mirror Says CMA Launched Merger Investigation On Acquisition Of Northern & Shell's UK Publishing Assets​
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - Trinity Mirror Plc:
* ‍STATEMENT RE COMPETITION AND MARKETS AUTHORITY MERGER INVESTIGATION​
* ‍NOTES CMA LAUNCHED MERGER INVESTIGATION IN RELATION TO ACQUISITION OF NORTHERN & SHELL’S UK PUBLISHING ASSETS​
* ‍CONTINUES TO BELIEVE THAT THERE WILL NOT BE ANY DETRIMENTAL IMPACT ON COMPETITION AS A RESULT OF ACQUISITION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
